general: Today, Virgo feels a wave of positive energy thanks to the alignment of Mercury and Jupiter. This favors exchanges and enhances clarity of mind. Take advantage of this day to organize your thoughts and projects.
love: Dare to express your feelings, it will strengthen your bond.
work: Showcase your organizational skills to impress your superiors.
health: Prioritize a balanced diet, your body needs it.
advice: Trust your intuition to move forward.
teaser: A constructive day awaits you, Virgo!
